content: chore: adaptations for nightly-2025-05-11 #24770 Please review this PR. At the end of the month this diff will land in 'master'.

Is there any point even merging this? The only change is to the batteries commit hash. I ask merely for information. I don't know whether my typing bors merge on that PR ultimately causes more work for people or less, or whether it doesn't even matter.

These PRs should all be merged.

I'm trying to automate more of this process still, and it's easiest for the bots if everything goes through.
Later we can just auto-merge any of these PRs that only touch boring files.
